code: import{FETCH_COURSES_PENDING,FETCH_COURSES_SUCCESS,FETCH_COURSES_FAIL,DELETE_COURSE}from'../constants/ActionTypes';import{getCourses,deleteCourse as deleteCourseService}from'../../services';var fetchCoursesPending=function fetchCoursesPending(){return{type:FETCH_COURSES_PENDING};};var fetchCoursesSuccess=function fetchCoursesSuccess(courses){return{type:FETCH_COURSES_SUCCESS,payload:courses};};var fetchCoursesFail=function fetchCoursesFail(error){return{type:FETCH_COURSES_FAIL,payload:error};};var deleteCourseSuccess=function deleteCourseSuccess(id){return{type:DELETE_COURSE,payload:id};};export var fetchCourses=function fetchCourses(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(fetchCoursesPending());getCourses().then(function(data){dispatch(fetchCoursesSuccess(data));}).catch(function(err){dispatch(fetchCoursesFail(err));});};};export var deleteCourse=function deleteCourse(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch(fetchCoursesPending());deleteCourseService(id).then(function(){dispatch(deleteCourseSuccess(id));}).catch(function(err){dispatch(fetchCoursesFail('DELETE_FAILED'));});};};
